attributes.additional_details: When a member of the HM Forces retires, and receives his/her pension, its normally not enough to live on, so many get a job in civilian life, their HM Forces pension is then classed as a second income and attracts the tax office to levy income tax  on their pensions, this e-petition, is saying we SHOULD give our VETERANS a break and make their pensions tax free.STOP TAXING THEIR PENSIONS ITS A DISGRACE!
